statements: SELECT * FROM fuel_efficiency_data WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT manufacturer, model, fuel_type FROM fuel_efficiency_data WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota';
SELECT fuel_economy, engine_size FROM fuel_efficiency_data WHERE transmission = 'Automatic' ORDER BY fuel_economy DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, model, fuel_type, fuel_economy FROM fuel_efficiency_data WHERE fuel_type = 'Electric' AND engine_size >= 2.0;
SELECT * FROM fuel_efficiency_data WHERE manufacturer LIKE '%Ford%' ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM fuel_efficiency_data WHERE fuel_type='Petrol' ORDER BY model DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT manufacturer, model, fuel_type, fuel_economy FROM fuel_efficiency_data WHERE engine_size >= 2.0 GROUP BY manufacturer ORDER BY fuel_economy DESC
SELECT manufacturer, model, engine_size, transmission FROM fuel_efficiency_data WHERE fuel_type='Diesel' AND engine_size < 2.0
SELECT manufacturer, model, fuel_type, fuel_economy, engine_size FROM fuel_efficiency_data WHERE manufacturer='Toyota' OR manufacturer='Honda' ORDER BY engine_size ASC, fuel_economy DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT manufacturer, model, engine_size, transmission FROM fuel_efficiency_data WHERE engine_size BETWEEN 1.5 AND 2.5 AND transmission='Automatic' ORDER BY manufacturer, model
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT make, model, fuel_type FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_type='Gasoline';
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT make, model, year, mileage FROM vehicles WHERE make='Toyota' ORDER BY year DESC, mileage DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY year DESC, make ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_type = 'Gasoline';
SELECT make, model, year, mileage FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2010 AND make LIKE 'Toy%';
SELECT v.make, v.model, f.date, f.fuel_consumed, f.distance_traveled FROM vehicles v JOIN fuel_efficiency f ON v.vehicle_id = f.vehicle_id WHERE f.efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY f.date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_vehicles, AVG(mileage) AS avg_mileage FROM vehicles GROUP BY year HAVING AVG(mileage) > 5000 ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_model, fuel_type FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_efficiency, vehicle_make FROM vehicles ORDER BY fuel_efficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption WHERE distance_traveled > 100 AND fuel_used < 20;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_type = 'Gasoline';
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, fuel_efficiency FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_make IN ('Toyota', 'Ford') ORDER BY fuel_efficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM trips INNER JOIN vehicles ON trips.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id WHERE trip_distance > 100 ORDER BY trip_date DESC;

SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, SUM(fuel_used) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption INNER JOIN vehicles ON fuel_consumption.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id GROUP BY vehicle_make, vehicle_model HAVING total_fuel_consumed > 50;
SELECT vehicle_make, AVG(fuel_efficiency) AS avg_efficiency FROM vehicles GROUP BY vehicle_make ORDER BY avg_efficiency DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM vehicles LIMIT 5
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_type FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_name ASC
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_capacity > 50
SELECT vehicles.vehicle_name, fuel_prices.price_per_gallon FROM vehicles INNER JOIN fuel_prices ON vehicles.fuel_type = fuel_prices.fuel_type_id

SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_types.fuel_name, fuel_prices.price_date FROM vehicles JOIN fuel_types ON vehicles.fuel_type = fuel_types.fuel_type_id JOIN fuel_prices ON fuel_prices.fuel_type_id = fuel_types.fuel_type_id ORDER BY fuel_prices.price_date DESC
SELECT * FROM vehicles
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_type FROM vehicles
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, fuel_type, mileage FROM vehicles WHERE mileage > 30
SELECT fuel_name, fuel_density FROM fuel_types
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_capacity, fuel_type FROM vehicles ORDER BY fuel_capacity DESC
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT make, model, fuel_type, year FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model, year, fuel_type FROM vehicles ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT AVG(fuel_volume), AVG(fuel_cost) FROM fuel_records;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year < 2015 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Honda' AND year >= 2010;
SELECT trip_id, start_location, end_location FROM trips WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM fuel_records ORDER BY fuel_date DESC LIMIT 5;
